entry.title: [RBX/GRA][Baremetal] - Network equipment maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 13, 19:00 UTC  -  Jul 14, 01:00 UTC

Jun 13, 23:11 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/07/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 14/07/2023 01:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement services, we will be upgrading the version of a network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX7][Dedicated Servers] - Room R713
entry.content:
Jun 26, 02:11 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/06/2023 21:19 UTC
End Time : 26/06/2023 02:03 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in room R713 were temporarily unreachable
Root cause : Electrical issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 25, 21:34 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/06/2023 21:19 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in room R713 are temporarily unreachable
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
